name: Zig Language Server
description: The Zig Language Server (ZLS) is a tool that implements Microsoft's Language Server Protocol for Zig in Zig. In simpler terms: it'll provide you with completions, go-to definition, etc. when you write Zig code!

name: ZLS Fuzzer (sus)
description: Sus ensures that ZLS behaves properly on edge cases by emitting Zig code generated by a markov chain and operating on it using our own LSP client.

name: Zig JNI Bindings
description: Bidirectional JNI interface written from scratch in Zig. Previously used by TigerBeetle to power their Java client.

name: JAZ
description: Java interpreter written in Zig alongside cf, a ClassFile parser/writer.

name: The Snitch Website
description: High school satirical publication that I directed as Editor in Chief. I wrote and edited articles, created our online identity and branding and wrote the website from scratch.

name: Software You Can Love Vancouver Website
description: Vancouver-based Zig conference hosted by a friend of mine, Matt Knight. I designed the website and refined it overtime to fit Matt's ticketing backend.

name: Zig Embedded Group Website
description: Worked with Matt and Felix to create a simple frontend and identity for the Zig Embedded Group.

name: ZEG AVR Bootloader
description: Worked alone to create and test an AVR bootloader in Zig for the Zig Embedded Group.

name: My Twitch Channel
description: Watch me live code on Twitch!
